{"id":1311760976,"question_id":3483,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"4 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1720279683,"status":14,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1311760976/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Alternating Groups II","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int numberOfAlternatingGroups(vector<int>& colors, int k) {\n        \n        int count_alternating = 0;\n        int n = colors.size();\n\n        for(int start=0; start<n; start++){\n\n            int end = start+k-1;\n            bool valid = true;\n            int prev = colors[start];\n\n            for(int i=start+1; i<=end; i++){\n\n                // cout << prev<< \" \"<<colors[i%n] <<endl;\n\n                if(colors[i%n] == prev){\n                    valid = false;\n                    break;\n                }\n                else{\n                    prev = colors[i%n];\n                    continue;\n                }\n            }\n            if(valid){\n                count_alternating++;\n            }\n        }\n        return count_alternating;   \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"alternating-groups-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
